message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm looking for a bit closer to my asking price. How about $13,700?
Alice,  I'm getting closer to your asking price, but $13,500 is the highest I'm willing to go right now.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
